posts.post_content:
From the planeswalker guide:  
  
"Talismans of silver no longer frighten nocturnal horrors."  
  
"Avacyn's presence was so powerful that faith in her yielded true power for clerics and other faithful: prayers to her could cause evil creatures to turn away, **silver weapons blessed by her priests** could slay great horrors"

posts.post_content:
Deathtouch vs. Werewolves would have made this artifact useless (not sealed worthy either), albeit more flavorful.  
Im glad they didnt give it an effect that depends on your OPPONENTS deck, and instead gave it an effect based on your OWN deck, the part that you can actually control.
